sentences.en: " Maybe we could call her Jamie, " Mother said.
sentences.cn: 妈妈说: “ 我们就称他杰米吧. ”

sentences.en: "Contractors are using fine print to deny women like Jamie Leigh Jones their day in court, " he said in a Senate debate.
sentences.cn: “承包商钻了法律的空子，拒绝类似杰米·雷·琼斯遭遇的妇女走向法庭。” 他在参议院辩论上说。

sentences.en: And to his dismay, the local black college turned Jamie down for a scholarship.
sentences.cn: 而且令他沮丧的是, 当地的黑人大学竟拒绝杰米申请奖学金.

sentences.en: At home in the evening, too, Dad prepared Jamie for a good education.
sentences.cn: 到夜晚, 爸爸在家里也为杰米受良好的教育准备好一切.

sentences.en: By the time Jamie was two she was " helping ".
sentences.cn: 杰米两岁时,就 “ 帮一把 ” 了.

sentences.en: Doug's 14-year-old son Jamie answered the phone.
sentences.cn: 道格14岁的儿子杰米接了电话。

sentences.en: Had Jamie ever been in any kind of trouble?
sentences.cn: 杰米遇到过什么麻烦吗？

sentences.en: I did not know Jamie had a knife.
sentences.cn: 我不知道杰米有一把刀。

sentences.en: I wore a large shirt of Jamie's which came down over my hips.
sentences.cn: 我穿着杰米的衬衫，衬衫很大，把我的臀部都盖住了。

sentences.en: Jamie e-mailed me to say he couldn't come.
sentences.cn: 杰米给我发了电子邮件，说他不能来了。

sentences.en: Jamie nestled up to his mother on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 杰米在沙发上偎依着母亲.

sentences.en: Jamie received her degree from California State University at Los Angeles. She had set the pattern.
sentences.cn: 杰米获得洛杉机市加利福尼亚州立大学的学位, 为我们树立了榜样.

sentences.en: Jamie was adroit at flattering others.
Jamie was snugly wrapped in a white woolen scarf.
sentences.cn: 杰米围着一条白色羊毛围巾舒适而暖和.

sentences.en: Jamie was unable to go to work today because he was sick.
sentences.cn: 杰米今天不能去上班,因为他病了.

sentences.en: Previous winners include Bono and Jamie Oliver, and the money is given to the winner's chosen charity.
sentences.cn: 以前的获奖者有波诺和杰米·奥利弗，奖金将赠予获奖者选择的慈善机构。

sentences.en: Some reports in the past week had even said she planned to name the child Jamilyn, after her younger sister Jamie and her mother Lynne.
sentences.cn: 在过去的一周内，有报道称她 计划给孩子起名叫杰米琳，名字取自于她妹妹的名字杰米和母亲的名字琳。

sentences.en: When Jamie began to wiggle, he switched to Bible stories, which were more interesting.
sentences.cn: 待到杰米开始扭动身子想走开时, 他便改讲更有趣的《圣经》故事.

phrases.tran_cn: 杰米·福克斯（美国著名男影星）

trans.tran_cn: [男子名] 杰米 James的昵称
